modName: Lighter Texture for The Notice Board
summary: This mod changes the color of the notice board in MannyGT's The Notice Board mod.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#f1c232][size=3]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/huDD6xN.jpg[/img]
[/size][/color][/center]
This is an extremely simple mod that modifies a single texture dds file in [color=#00ff00]Manny[/color]G[color=#ff0000]T's[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70142/?]The Notice Board [/url]mod, based on fadingsignal's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70260/?]new textures.[/url] I found fadingsignal's new textures beautiful and detailed, but the crimson color scheme is a bit out of place, considering most of the places with the boards have a lighter, less saturated palette (like the rest of Skyrim.) Thus, I spent a few minutes and made some changes. Submitted here is the said file for your pleasure and convenience, in case you are too busy to do it yourselves.

There are two versions of this mod: one with everything lighter, the other one with lighter board but darker metal part (so the metal part looks more like iron instead of steel.) You can choose the one that best suits your taste.

[color=#f1c232][size=3]REQUIREMENT:[/size][/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70142/?]The Notice Board [/url]mod by [color=#00ff00]Manny[/color]G[color=#ff0000]T[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70260/?]The Notice Board Redefined - New Meshes and Textures[/url] by fadingsignal

[color=#f1c232][size=3]COMPATIBILITY:[/size][/color]
This mod is compatible with every mods in existence except the ones that also modifies the same file (noticeboard01.dds)

[size=3][color=#f1c232]CREDITS:[/color][/size]
[color=#00ff00]Manny[/color]G[color=#ff0000]T[/color] - the original author of The Notice Board, one of the best Skyrim mods.
fadingsignal - for the excellent new textures further enhancing the experience.

[url=https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods/]
[/url]
author: yian

files.name: The Notice Board Lighter Texture with Darker Metal
files.fileName: The Notice Board Lighter Texture with Darker Metal-71748-1-0.zip
